DOC.criteria: Age≥18 ; American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) class 13 ; Scheduled elective open laparoscopic abdominal surgery anticipate last less 4 hour ; Administration general anesthesia ≥ 1 dose nondepolarizing neuromuscular blocker endotracheal intubation maintenance neuromuscular blockade ; Planned extubation occur OR ; Signed informed consent . Redo surgery hospital admission ; Preestablished need expect require postoperative mechanical ventilation ; Conditions , surgical procedure , participant positioning may interfere TOFWatch SX® operation , calibration , accuracy ; Anesthesiologist use objective neuromuscular monitoring surgery ( e.g . mechanomyography , electromyography related method ) ; Pregnancy ; Participation clinical trial ; Member family member personnel investigational Sponsor staff directly involve trial .
